channel.title: Win a key for Alpha+ Access! (Ended)
channel.description:
## Greetings Nobles! Our Court is inviting you to Castle Adiart! But only four may procure an invite, who will it be?
**YOU** have the chance to become apart of the Royal Court here in Castle Adiart. To become a subject of the Court, you simply need to understand our scriptures upon the 'Wikia' a place of great knowledge and understanding of how things work! Our scribes work heavily on it!
However, :teemo: Teemo :teemo:, the little bugger, has been running all over it, and getting his paws on our work! Please, go around the Wiki and find this mischievous little devil!
Scouts have reported 4 instances of Teemo dotted about! Screen shot him on the page and send me a Private Message on the forums once you've found him! We encourage heavy scouting, our scouts haven't pinpointed the exact locations.
Once you've submitted your screen shots, you'll be entered into a raffle! There are 4 KEYS TO BE WON! 2 keys are being provided by @robflop because he's a beautiful person!
Oh, there are also rules!
You can't already own the game! Also, if you are caught editting out a Teemo, you'll be DQ'd! Make sure you are apart of the Discord too! : https://discord.gg/rFAXXQB
## The first person to find all *4* Teemo will win the first key! After that, everybody else that finds all *4* Teemo will be put into a Raffle and it will be drawn from RNG for the last three keys
http://tol.wikia.com/
##[color=red]FOUND ONE? Message ThePlex in the [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) channel![/color]

item.title: Win a key for Alpha+ Access! (Ended)
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Greetings Nobles! Our Court is inviting you to Castle Adiart! But only four may procure an invite, who will it be?

YOU have the chance to become apart of the Royal Court here in Castle Adiart. To become a subject of the Court, you simply need to understand our scriptures upon the ‘Wikia’ a place of great knowledge and understanding of how things work! Our scribes work heavily on it!

However, Teemo , the little bugger, has been running all over it, and getting his paws on our work! Please, go around the Wiki and find this mischievous little devil!

Scouts have reported 4 instances of Teemo dotted about! Screen shot him on the page and send me a Private Message on the forums once you’ve found him! We encourage heavy scouting, our scouts haven’t pinpointed the exact locations.

Once you’ve submitted your screen shots, you’ll be entered into a raffle! There are 4 KEYS TO BE WON! 2 keys are being provided by @robflop because he’s a beautiful person!

Oh, there are also rules!

You can’t already own the game! Also, if you are caught editting out a Teemo, you’ll be DQ’d!
Make sure you are apart of the Discord too! : https://discord.gg/rFAXXQB

The first person to find all 4 Teemo will win the first key! After that, everybody else that finds all 4 Teemo will be put into a Raffle and it will be drawn from RNG for the last three keys

http://tol.wikia.com/

##FOUND ONE? Message ThePlex in the Discord channel!
